biotools.summary: PI2PE (Protein Interface/Interior Prediction Engine) consists of three predictors (WESA, cons-PPISP, and DISPLAR) for predicting solvent accessibility and interface residues from the structure of a protein-binding or DNA-binding protein.

bioschemas.name: PI2PE
bioschemas.summary: PI2PE (Protein Interface/Interior Prediction Engine) consists of three predictors (WESA, cons-PPISP, and DISPLAR) for predicting solvent accessibility and interface residues from the structure of a protein-binding or DNA-binding protein.
